history.text: Hello!
The name of the movie is Bruce Almighty
Jim carrey is in it.
HI
Yes he is.
HE plays Bruce Nolan
Morgan Freeman plays God
Jennifer Aniston plays Grace Connely, and Lisa Ann Walter plays Debbie COnnely
It is suppose to be funny.
Philip Baker Hall also makes an appearance playing Jack Baylor
It is interesting becuase Bruce - Jim character plays a news reporter.
Bruce almighty was made in 2003 and is a Comedy
It was directed by Tom Shadyac
It was given 48% on Rotton Tomatoes, and a metacritic score of 46/100
But Cinemascore gave it an A
That seems strange that it got two bad rating and one good rating
I thought the same thing
One critic said Carrey is hilarious but the movie got bogged down in treacle
Maybe they didn't watch the same movie - Bruce Almighty - maybe they really like Jim Carrey.
Another critic made a comment about how Bruce plays a news reporter hoping to bame it big becoming an anchor, comparing it to Carrey's career becoming a real actor
their opinion, not mine!
According to another critical response it is suppose to be hilarious.
There defintion must be different then the rest of us.

But the movie it self is about a TV reporter complaining 
 to God that he isn't doing his job, so God offers him the chance to be God for a week.
So he could take his girl of his dreams Grace out to a fancy restaurant. that makes alot of sense...
I am pretty sure if he heard all voices in his head like he does... It would drive him a bit crazy..

yep! So he becomes God, and starts hearing voices which he finds out are peoples prayers. He gets so overwhelemed that he sets a program to automatically answer "yes" to all of them, trying to make everyone happy
His idea of setting response to auto won't cause any problems.
haha of course not!
It helps him win his job back but everything comes with a price.
He also has a girlfriend (jennifer aniston) and a mild crush on his co-worker Susan Ortega (played by Catherine Bell) who barely seems to notice him
Nearing the end, God appears to Bruce and tells him to pray for what he truly wants, which he prays for Grace to find a man that would make her happy
All he wants to do it make Grace happy.
God's way of making that happen is to put Bruce in the hospital after being miraculously revived by doctors where Grace and he reconcile
And then of course Bruce has a more positive spin on life
So he has a enligtened moment
Yep!
So basicly the end of the movie is saying God is everywhere...
And it ends with a homeless man holding a sign with a philosophical message that Bruce had ran into eralier, revealing himself to God

uid1response.feedback: The conversation was OK. We able to give and response to each other. I wouldn't say it was completely natural language though.
